sentences.en: A rift trough along Mianxian - Lueyang ophiolitic melange belt was formed from Ordovician to Silurian.
sentences.cn: 奥陶纪—志留纪大致沿勉略构造带形成南秦岭裂陷槽.

sentences.en: From the Early Silurian large scale of retrogression had begun accompanying the Late Caledonian movement.
sentences.cn: 晚加里东运动(始于早志留世)发生了大规模的海退.

sentences.en: It changed to ancient land due vertical movement in the end of the Silurian.
sentences.cn: 南秦岭在早古生代是扬子板块的被动大陆边缘,在志留纪末曾因垂向隆升变为古陆.

sentences.en: Porphyry mineralization, occurred in the Silurian Period, finally formed ore bodies.
sentences.cn: 晚期矿化发生于志留纪, 使矿床最终形成.

sentences.en: Silurian System in Tarim Basin is distributed in an area of about 23.
sentences.cn: 塔里木盆地志留系分布面积约23.

sentences.en: Sq 1 , Sq 4, Sq 10 are three favorableexploratory sequence of the Silurian and Devonian in Tarim basin.
sentences.cn: Sq1 、 Sq4、Sq10是塔里木盆地志留-泥盆系的三个有利勘探层序.

sentences.en: The contact relationship between Silurian and Devonian is parallel unconformity.
sentences.cn: 泥盆系与志留系之间为平行不整合接触.

sentences.en: The discovery of the Silurian - Devonian oil and gas reservoir reveals a good exploration prospect.
sentences.cn: 塔里木盆地志留 - 泥盆系油气藏的发现,展示了志留-泥盆系良好的勘探潜力.

sentences.en: The hydrocarbon generation content in Lower Cambrian and Lower Silurian is up to 60 % ～80 % of total.
sentences.cn: 原始生烃量以下古生界为主,下寒武统和下志留统的生烃量约占总生烃量的60%～80%.

sentences.en: THE RETZIELLIDAE ( SILURIAN RIBBED IMPUNCTATE ATHYRIDIDINE BRACHIOPODS )
sentences.cn: 论志留纪的小莱采贝类——具壳线、无疹无窗贝族(腕足动物 )

trans.tran_en: of, denoting, or formed in the third period of the Palaeozoic era, between the Ordovician and Devonian periods, which lasted for 25 million years, during which fishes first appeared
